reviewtext: This labeling tape is pretty good, and it is darn near impossible to screw it up: drop it into the label machine, type up your label(s), have it print, then peel off the backing and apply.  I actually love these labels vs. what I have used in the past as it is truly a print, peel, and stick type of label with no mess and crisp, professional-looking fonts.  This tape is also much better than the tape that originally came with the machine as this tape is much longer and will last for a lot more labels.To top everything else off as I type this review, I saved a little over $10 as the price I paid on Amazon was $14.34 vs. $24.99 for the same exact roll at the Office Depot down the street.
summary: Nice Label and $10 Cheaper Here than at Office Depot
